bibl.title: Letter from W. Byam to Henry Rose Carter, March 24, 1919

div1.p: Byam writes that he has received Carter's manuscript.

div1.head: Letter from W. Byam to Henry Rose Carter, March 24, 1919
div1.opener:

OXFORD UNIVERSITY PRESS, JOHN ERNEST HODDER WILLIAMS
ROBERT PERCY HODDER WILLIAMS ARTHUR CECIL STOUGHTON
HENRY.FROWDE
HODDER &
STOUGHTON

CITY {8961
{8962
Telegraphic Address
“OXYMORON
CENT, LONDON”
ALL.COMMUNICATIONS
TO.BE.ADDRESSED
TO.THE.MANAGERS
THE
OXFORD.MEDICAL
PUBLICATIONS
OXFORD.PRESS
.WAREHOUSE.
FALCON.SQUARE
LONDON.E.C.1
AWARDED GRAND PRIX AT THE
17TH INTERNATIONAL CONGRESS
OF MEDICINE, LONDON, 1913
24. 3. 1919. 12 Heath Mansions,
Hampstead. N.W. 3.
1919.
THE PRACTICE OF MEDICINE IN THE TROPICS.
Dear General Carter-
div1.p:
Your contribution has just reached me. I
have not had time to read it as yet, but probably you
will be glad to hear of its safe arrival. I will
write more fully later.
